role.title: Role of the Platform
role.1.1: Beamly acts solely as a digital intermediary between Freelancers and Clients.
role.1.2: We are not a contracting party and do not provide the services delivered by Freelancers ourselves.
role.1.3: We do not guarantee the quality, legality, professionalism, or timeliness of services provided by Freelancers.
role.1.4: Any agreement, payment, or communication is the sole responsibility of the parties involved.

use.title: Use of the Platform
use.2.1: You agree to use the platform only for lawful purposes and in compliance with the laws of Albania and Kosovo.
use.2.2: You may not publish or offer content that infringes copyright, privacy rights, or any other applicable law.
use.2.3: You are solely responsible for your content, actions, and communications on the platform.

taxes.title: Income Reporting and Taxes
taxes.3.1: Freelancers are solely responsible for registering, reporting, and paying any taxes, contributions, or legal obligations arising from their income.
taxes.3.2: Beamly is not responsible for non-reporting or incorrect reporting of income by Freelancers.
taxes.3.3: The platform does not provide tax advice or accounting services.

payments.title: Payments and Commissions
payments.4.1: All payments for services provided by Freelancers must be made exclusively through the platform's payment system.
payments.4.2: Payments are processed via Stripe, a licensed third-party payment service provider, which acts as an authorized intermediary for collecting and disbursing funds. Once payment from the Client is processed, Beamly receives the amount from Stripe and transfers the payment to the Freelancer, withholding a commission as a service fee.
payments.4.3: Users are prohibited from circumventing the platform's payment system by making direct payments outside the platform. Any attempt to do so may result in suspension or termination of the account.
payments.4.4: Our commissions do not include any applicable taxes or fees under the laws of Albania or Kosovo; Users are responsible for any such obligations.

security.title: Security and Communication
security.5.1: Use the platform's internal communication system for transparency and documentation. Agreements made outside the platform are not protected.
security.5.2: Avoid sharing personal, financial, or account password information with third parties.
security.5.3: Any suspicious activity must be reported immediately to the platform, which may take action in accordance with its policies.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Liability
disclaimer.6.1: The platform shall not be liable for any loss, damage, dispute, claim, or expense arising from:
disclaimer.item2: Failure by Freelancers to report income.
disclaimer.item3: Informal agreements or financial disputes between parties.
disclaimer.6.2: The User acknowledges that use of the platform is entirely at their own risk.

law.title: Governing Law and Jurisdiction
law.7.1: These Terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Albania and the Republic of Kosovo — depending on the platform's place of operation.
law.7.2: Any dispute shall be resolved exclusively by the competent courts selected by the platform (Albania or Kosovo).

amendments.title: Amendments to the Terms
amendments.8.1: The platform reserves the right to modify any clause of these Terms at any time.
amendments.8.2: The updated version will be published immediately and shall take effect upon posting.

conclusion.title: Conclusion
conclusion.content: By using Beamly, you confirm that you have read, understood, and accepted these Terms.

collect.title: Information We Collect
items: Account Information: Name, email address, username, password, profile photo.
Contact Information: Phone number, billing address, location data.
Payment Information: Processed securely by Stripe; we do not store your full payment card details.
Transaction Data: Details of services purchased, amounts, and dates of payments.
Communication Data: Messages and files exchanged through the platform.
Technical Data: IP address, browser type, device type, and cookies.

use.title: How We Use Your Data
items: Providing and operating the platform.
Processing payments and transferring funds to Freelancers.
Facilitating communication between Clients and Freelancers.
Enforcing our Terms and Conditions.
Improving user experience and platform functionality.
Preventing fraud, abuse, and illegal activities.
Complying with legal obligations (including tax reporting where applicable).

legal.title: Legal Basis for Processing
items: Your consent (e.g., for marketing communications).
Contractual necessity (e.g., providing services you requested).
Legal obligations (e.g., tax, anti-fraud measures).
Legitimate interests (e.g., improving our services).

sharing.title: Data Sharing and Disclosure
items: Payment processors (e.g., Stripe) to process transactions.
Service providers (e.g., hosting, analytics, email services).
Legal authorities when required by law or court order.
Business partners only with your consent.

transfers.title: International Data Transfers
transfers.content: If your data is transferred outside Albania, Kosovo, or the EU, we ensure adequate protection under GDPR-compliant safeguards (e.g., Standard Contractual Clauses).

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required by law.

rights.title: Your Rights
items: Access your personal data.
Request correction or deletion.
Object to or restrict processing.
Request data portability.
Withdraw consent at any time.
File a complaint with the Commissioner for Personal Data Protection in Albania or the Agency for Information and Privacy in Kosovo.

cookies.title: Cookies
items: Enable core platform functions.
Improve user experience.
Analyze usage patterns.

security.title: Security Measures
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated 'Last Updated' date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions or requests regarding this Privacy Policy, you can contact us at:

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Start your journey in just a few simple steps
howItWorks.description: Whether you're a freelancer looking for opportunities or a client seeking talent, we've made the process simple and efficient.

step1.title: Create Your Profile
step1.description: Sign up and build your professional profile. Showcase your skills, experience, and portfolio to attract potential clients.

step2.title: Find Opportunities
step2.description: Browse through hundreds of job listings that match your skills. Use filters to find projects that fit your expertise and availability.

step3.title: Submit Proposals
step3.description: Write compelling proposals for projects you're interested in. Highlight your relevant experience and explain how you can help.

step4.title: Get Hired
step4.description: Clients review your proposal and profile. Once selected, discuss project details and agree on terms with your client.

step5.title: Get Paid Securely
step5.description: Complete the work and receive payment through our secure platform. Build your reputation with client reviews.

step1.title: Post Your Job
step1.description: Describe your project, set your budget, and specify the skills you need. Your job will be visible to thousands of qualified freelancers.

step2.title: Receive Proposals
step2.description: Get proposals from interested freelancers within hours. Review their profiles, portfolios, and proposed rates.

step3.title: Select the Best
step3.description: Compare proposals, interview candidates if needed, and choose the freelancer that best fits your project requirements.

step4.title: Collaborate
step4.description: Work directly with your freelancer. Communicate through our platform, share files, and track project progress.

step5.title: Complete & Review
step5.description: Once satisfied with the work, release payment and leave a review. Build lasting relationships with talented freelancers.
